summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3858 for the improvement of North 72nd Street, from Greenwood Avenue to West Green Lake Way; by constructing watermains; under Ordinance No. 47197, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
